Token.Abstract: A simple helper class used to facilitate file management.
Opens a text file specified by the given @p filename, which is actually a path relative to the project folder.

Parameter.Name: filename
Parameter.Abstract: The path to the file, relative to the project foler.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSString with the file's contents.

Token.Abstract: Used mostly internally by the FileHelper, returns a path to the file specified by the given @p filename, which should actually be a path relative to the project folder.. The path returned should be ready to be opened by system methods such as @p -stringWithContentsOfFile.

Parameter.Name: filename
Parameter.Abstract: The path to the file, relative to the project foler.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A path to the specified file.
